title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new sync or async validator in the given or default project.

shared.description: Specifies whether to create item in shared directory.

x-prompt.message: which directory in which validator be created?

path.description: The path at which to create the validator file, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder. Default mode is set to `libs`
path.x-prompt: Where to create new validator, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder (default set to create 'libs' validator, use option --shared to create shared validator)? (--path)

name.description: The name of the new validator.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the validator? (--name)

x-prompt.message: What type of validator to be created? (--type)

form.description: Specifies type of Angular form in which validator be used (Reactive form / Template-driven form).

x-prompt.message: What type of Angular form in which validator be used? (--form)
